title: Biden's Rush to Appoint Judges
itunes:title: Biden's Rush to Appoint Judges
description:
Carl Tobias, a professor at the University of Richmond Law School, discusses President Joe Biden's latest judicial nominations and the rush to confirm judges.

Mark Rifkin, a partner at Wolf Haldenstein who represents consumers in an antitrust action against Apple, discusses the recent ruling in the year long battle between the iPhone maker and Epic Games.

June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
